name: Noodle Clicker
description: Click and grow your noodle empire in Noodle Clicker. You can upgrade to different types of noodles and add ingredients. You can make factories and automate your noodle-making process.  This game is in extremely early development everything is subject to change. I have a lot of plans for the game. I am fixing bugs and adding content. The current version is to find out if people are interested in the main idea and raise funds. Please Submit bugs and feature requests to the community board. Happy gaming.
